actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into annual contributions contracts with respect to housing located in a certain area in Odessa, Texas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into annual contributions contracts pursuant to the United States Housing Act of 1937 for the purpose of providing housing for low-income and elderly individuals in a specified area of Odessa, Texas.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to enter into annual contributions contracts with respect to housing located in a certain area in Odessa, Texas.
